definition: to set up/to arrange/to establish/to found/to display
to prepare/get ready/to provide or equip

sentences.english: We do not have a bath tub, nor a shower on the train.
sentences.chinese: 車上沒有浴盆，也沒有沐浴設備。

sentences.english: Most of the global companies are moving manufacturing facilities out-side of Japan.
sentences.chinese: 大多數跨國公司都在把生產設備遷出日本。

sentences.english: Make sure none of the audio components are positioned too close to the TV set.
sentences.chinese: 確認各聲頻設備是否太靠近電視機。

sentences.english: Yes, it was about the car auxiliary power plants, am I right?
sentences.chinese: 當然，那是關於轎車輔助動力設備，是嗎？

sentences.english: Do you think it's possible for me to change to a single room with a bath?
sentences.chinese: 你覺得我有可能換到一間有衛浴設備的單人房嗎？

sentences.english: Engine room machinery and equipment, electrical and automatic machinery.
sentences.chinese: 機房機械設備，電器及自動化機械。

sentences.english: The utility model thoroughly solves the wind-proof problem and the slide-proof problem; heavy equipment can not be damaged by the utility model.
sentences.chinese: 徹底解決了防風抗滑問題，保住重大設備不受損失。

sentences.english: The die contacting press is the special equipment of automobile die.
sentences.chinese: 模具研配液壓機是研配汽車模具的專用設備。

sentences.english: Aseptically pass not less than 10 pathway volumes of Fluid D through each device tested.
sentences.chinese: 以無菌操作用10個通道體積的液體D通過供試設備。

sentences.english: The company has advanced technology equipment and pipe sound detection equipment.
sentences.chinese: 公司擁有先進的制管工藝設備和完善的檢測設備。

sentences.english: The company has advanced technology equipment and pipe sound detection equipment.
sentences.chinese: 公司擁有先進的制管工藝設備和完善的檢測設備。

sentences.english: Attica is defined by avantgarde design and top-notch sound from a world-class system.
sentences.chinese: 愛奇多被評爲設計前衛且音響設備頂尖的俱樂部。

sentences.english: Impedance transformer is one kind of main equipment of track circuit in electrification district.
sentences.chinese: 扼流變壓器是電化區段構成軌道電路的主要設備之一。

sentences.english: Does the supplier have adequate equipment and facilities for performing ISIR's?
sentences.chinese: 供應商是否有足夠的設備進行樣品檢驗？

sentences.english: Using low pass filters before the readout device may also reduce bandwidth.
sentences.chinese: 在讀出設備之前採用低通濾波器也可以減小帶寬。

sentences.english: Two free internet terminals can be found in the Lindner's business corner.
sentences.chinese: 酒店的商業角落提供兩個免費上網設備。

definition: to put to use/to apply/practical/applied (science, linguistics etc)/application/practical use/(computing) app
to set up/to arrange/to establish/to found/to display
to advance/to conduct/underway/in progress/to do/to carry out/to carry on/to execute
